document.full_text: a senate subcommittee is nearing completion of a long-awaited report on the role wall street banks played in creating complex securities that fueled the meltdown of the housing market, according to the wall street journal.
document.title: senate report on subprime mess due soon: report
lines_and_colors: a senate subcommittee is nearing completion of a long-awaited report on the role wall street banks played in creating complex securities that fueled the meltdown of the housing market, according to the wall street journal.
